name: Pix (64x64 Game Jam)
description:
Pix is on a quest to collect colorful, sparkling pixels - but the way is perilous and filled with danger. Death is around every corner in this risky mission to recover the glowing goodness, but well worth the loss of life and limb when all the pixels are found!

CONTROLS

Keyboard/Mouse: Arrow keys to move, Space to jump

This small game was created for the 2016 64x64 game jam. Technically, it breaks some of the rules, but you should just play it and have fun anyway!
